snippet.title: SCP: Labrat Early Access - Trailer
snippet.description:
SCP: Labrat - Early access coming early 2021
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1402020/SCP_Labrat/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/jaW3SK7
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/BezbroGames
Website: https://bezbrogames.com

SCP: Labrat is a faithful VR recreation of SCP - Containment Breach by Undertow Games. SCP: Labrat takes place during a containment breach where you must escape the facility. Escape by yourself or with others, dodging SCPs, and collecting valuable resources along the way.

SCP: Labrat and this trailer are licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
